section_purpose: To situate the paper's contributions within the broader research landscape by discussing related work in SAT solvers and symmetry breaking for GNN-based SAT solving.
key_points: The paper distinguishes its focus on variable dependency from traditional symmetry breaking techniques in SAT solving.
It reviews GNN-based SAT solving methods, noting they often lack explicit mechanisms for handling variable dependency.
It connects the concept of variable dependency to ideas like functional dependency and symmetry in classical SAT solving.
dependencies: Background sections (2.2, 2.3) on GNN-based SAT solving
